title: Glee Totally Unofficial: The Ultimate Guide to the Smash-Hit High School Musical
description: The ultimate source for all the Gleeky facts you wanted to know, Glee Totally Unofficial offers fans of all ages an unauthorized peek behind the scenes of this runaway hit. Readers will learn about all of the hard work that went into the making of the award-winning show while offering fans details about each of the stars' backgrounds.
author: Lisa Damian Kidder
